attributes.action: Make Rememberance Day 11th November a Bank Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that there should be a Bank Holiday on 11th November as a mark of respect for all those that have made the ultimate sacrifice in fighting, either being Killed or wounded, for this country of ours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
